title: Pole shifts
description: Jumping from one galaxy to the next, the aerialist discovers the intricate relativeness of infinite realities and learns to rely on his imagination for a melodious stride. Confronted by repeated mood swings, the rope dancer finds in his eighth episode that in certain worlds, keeping your balance is a draining affair. Already available: - The hair of the comet - Five minutes to Doomsday - Perpetual emotion - The Uneventful Galaxy - The pragmatic hitchhiker - Messy Christmas - The Reincarnation Office
author: Jean-Yves Crozier
